introduction: Boston (MA) Alumni Chapter is responsible for advising the undergraduate chapters at Chi Chapter (Boston University), Theta Iota (Massachusetts Institute of Technology), and Lambda Xi (Brown University).

chapters.name: Chi Chapter
chapters.description: The Mighty Chi Chapter of Kappa Alpha Psi Fraternity, Inc. was chartered by the Significant Six on the campus of Boston University. Being a city-wide chapter, the Chi Chapter has members from all over the Boston Area.
activities: Works closely with the Paul Robeson Institute for Positive Self-Development (PRI) to tutor Boston's high school students each week in mathematics, science, English, and social studies
East Boston Soup Kitchen volunteer work
chapters.notable: Chi Chapter Brothers play an active role in the Boston community and continue to lead the city socially.

chapters.name: Theta Iota Chapter
chapters.description: Theta Iota Chapter was chartered at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology. For the nine Brothers of this Chapter, it was the realization of an idea to bring a black fraternity to their campus, and make it a viable organization within their black community.
reach: University of Massachusetts at Amherst (now Nu Tau)
chapters.notable: The chapter's reach includes universities that lie north and west of the Charles River. The Theta Iota Chapter welcomed four new members in Spring 2018.

chapters.name: Lambda Xi Chapter
chapters.description: The Lambda Xi Chapter of Kappa Alpha Psi Fraternity, Incorporated was established at Brown University. Seven men were instrumental in bringing Kappa Alpha Psi to the state of Rhode Island.

milestones.event: Brother Joseph Barros became the first initiate from Johnson & Wales University
Branched out to Bryant University with Brothers Dale Codrington, Devante Heath, and Dujuan Heath as first initiates

chapters.vision: To foster a positive fraternal environment; to achieve and continue growth within the local community and on campus, while continuing to serve as an invaluable asset to the State of Rhode Island through active participation.
chapters.notable: Lambda Xi has proven that Kappa Alpha Psi is the premier fraternity in Rhode Island.
